sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { PointCalculationInput, PointBreakdown, PointGrade } from '../types'; import { calculatePoints, getPointGrade, getPointExplanation } from '../utils/pointCalculator'; import { Container, Card, Title, Subtitle, Button, Input, Select, Label, FormGroup, Grid, Flex, Badge, ProgressBar, Alert } from './styled/CommonStyles'; interface PointCalculatorProps { onCalculate: (breakdown: PointBreakdown, grade: PointGrade, userInput: PointCalculationInput) => void; } const PointCalculator: React.FC = ({ onCalculate }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ age: 25, homelessPeriod: 12, dependents: 0, subscriptionAccountPeriod: 6, income: 2500, householdType: 'single', region: '서울' }); const [breakdown, setBreakdown] = useState(null); const [grade, setGrade] = useState(null); const handleInputChange = (field: keyof PointCalculationInput, value: string | number) => { setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [field]: value })); }; const handleCalculate = () => { const calculatedBreakdown = calculatePoints(formData); const calculatedGrade = getPointGrade(calculatedBreakdown.totalPoints); setBreakdown(calculatedBreakdown); setGrade(calculatedGrade); onCalculate(calculatedBreakdown, calculatedGrade, formData); }; const explanations = breakdown ? getPointExplanation(breakdown) : null; return ( 청약 가점 자동 계산기 기본 정보 입력 handleInputChange('age', parseInt(e.target.value) || 0)} min="19" max="100" /> handleInputChange('homelessPeriod', parseInt(e.target.value) || 0)} min="0" max="600" /> handleInputChange('dependents', parseInt(e.target.value) || 0)} min="0" max="10" /> handleInputChange('subscriptionAccountPeriod', parseInt(e.target.value) || 0)} min="0" max="600" /> handleInputChange('income', parseInt(e.target.value) || 0)} min="0" max="10000" /> {breakdown && grade && ( 가점 결과 총 가점: {breakdown.totalPoints}점 - {grade.description}

항목별 점수

나이 {breakdown.agePoints}점
무주택 기간 {breakdown.homelessPoints}점
부양가족 수 {breakdown.dependentsPoints}점
청약통장 {breakdown.subscriptionAccountPoints}점
소득 {breakdown.incomePoints}점

가점 설명

{explanations && (

나이: {explanations.age}

무주택 기간: {explanations.homeless}

부양가족 수: {explanations.dependents}

청약통장: {explanations.subscriptionAccount}

소득: {explanations.income}

)}
)} ); }; export default PointCalculator;
